response:
Left-sided limb dysmetria, dysdiadochokinesia and ataxic gait with normal tone, power and reflexes indicate an ipsilateral cerebellar lesion, and primary-position downbeat nystagmus is typical of vestibulocerebellar/cervicomedullary involvement. Reduced left visual acuity with a left RAPD and otherwise normal ocular motility localise an additional afferent lesion anterior to the chiasm in the left optic nerve.

lesion_locations = ["left cerebellum", "left optic nerve"]
